titles.title: A resolution supporting the goals and ideals of Infant Mortality Awareness Month.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.
Senate Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions discharged by Unanimous Consent.

vote.text: Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

bill.summary: 9/22/2005--Passed Senate without amendment. Expresses support for the goals and ideals of Infant Mortality Awareness Month (September 2005) to: (1) increase national awareness of infant mortality and its contributing factors; and (2) facilitate activities that will assist local communities in their efforts to meet the objective of reducing the rate of infant mortality to not more than 4.5 infant deaths per 1,000 births.
